website_summaries.verdict: Sure, it's pricey, but Photoshop CS6 moves the bar even higher for image editing software, now with serious video editing, content-aware editing, and a cleaner interface.

customer_reviews.title: The ultimate photo editing software
customer_reviews.text: I up graded to Photoshop 6 from version 3 and find it a great improvement.A particular blessing is the superb tool for removing Chromatic Abhoration. The only warning that I would give is that it needs a 64 bit operating system to work swiftly. It will work with 32 bit but is not happy.
customer_reviews.author: camera

customer_reviews.title: Has all the tools as per my old copy of Photoshop
customer_reviews.text: Had previously bought Elements and found that was not for me, too many expected commands and much else not available. CS6 takes some learning but as already was a Photoshop in days gone by, not too much effort to learn new tools. Adobe licensing model is a negative issue for many ..... myself included!
customer_reviews.author: Paul JR

customer_reviews.title: Photoshop CS6
customer_reviews.text: Bit of a mountain to climb but well worth the effort. We came from CS3 so we had some familiarity with the basic programme. Still not exploited all of it has to offer so we are only about a third of the way up the mountain! It's not cheap but well worth it if you want professional results.
customer_reviews.author: Alison L

customer_reviews.title: excellen and have a great deal of fun using it - onlyn wish I ...
customer_reviews.text: excellen and have a great deal of fun using it - onlyn wish I knew how to utilise all of its amazing facilities
customer_reviews.author: Bodhi S

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Not so easy to use as previous systems. Do not like the black screen, have not found out if I can change this. Still learning how to do things I found easy before. Have not yet tried editing videos.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of software
customer_reviews.text: I can't blame people wanting perpetual licence software, since CC or 365 don't have much to offer in return for people who subscribe to their software
customer_reviews.author: SynchMeister

customer_reviews.title: Adobe Photoshop cs6
customer_reviews.text: This has been added to my CS6 PREM PRO collection for faster integration of my editing suite utilities. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: A must!
customer_reviews.text: Life wouldn't be the same without Photoshop for me! A great investment if you enjoy photography. Weather creating or enhancing photographs, this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: H G

customer_reviews.title: Photoshop 6
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy this version so I could convert my Raw's. Expensive piece of software but very good for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: ron lines

customer_reviews.title: Very comprehensive software
customer_reviews.text: I am currently just getting used to it and it will take sometime get good at it but I've already used to help with my Photography homework
customer_reviews.author: Neil Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Best tool for photography adjusting
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed by this software, a real professional tool for editing and balancing images, I recommend it to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Andor Csorvasi

customer_reviews.title: Adobe Photoshop CS6
customer_reviews.text: Great application which I have used before, and so thought I would have a copy of my own at home.
customer_reviews.author: MR ROBERT DUTTON

customer_reviews.title: fab
customer_reviews.text: cs6 the gold standard processing software... great improvement in content aware fill i wish it handled nikon raw better. industry standard
customer_reviews.author: dominic cox

customer_reviews.title: Photoshop CS6
customer_reviews.text: Being a keen amateur photographer for many years,I had mainly used photoshop elements,dreaming that one day I would be able to save enough money to by photoshop,and when I did I was not disappointed,this is by far the best program that I have ever used,I cannot find the words to tell you how pleased that I am,with photoshop,all I can say is its absolutely perfect,and thank you to the photoshop team for such a fab program
customer_reviews.author: F. Heath

customer_reviews.title: Photoshop Cs6 - Photoshop 5
customer_reviews.text: I have used Photoshop version 5 since 1999 and it still works fine. Only point is it does not work properly with Windows 7 64 bit. So I decided to buy a new version CS6 (updates from PH 5 tot CS6 not provided). Sure there are a few newbies but the price is way to high for the difference. Another point is: I ordered on August 1 to receive the item on Augustus 27..................
customer_reviews.author: redcanard

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product advertised as new but in the invoice it was described as second hand. It looks like a pirate edition and when I registered Adobe they had no record of this. The disc also appears to be infected with malware, and came in a cheap paper container.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Huba

customer_reviews.title: Needs a zero star rating.
customer_reviews.text: Steer clear, doubt very much that any of the software they sell is as described, but even if it is Photoshop CS6 is grossly over priced for such an old piece of software. It sold for 7x less on its release, hardly gone up in value over the past 8 years, worth no more than £50 and even that is a stretch. Don't be fooled, better software at under £100 is available, like Affinity and Luminar, lots of other offerings over £100 but a lot less that £700 are available which can seriously compete with CS6.
customer_reviews.author: rojblake

customer_reviews.title: Photoshop CS6
customer_reviews.text: I've grown up with The Gimp (excellent free software) and Elements 5. The new Photoshop CS6 is rather better, very intuitive to use and breathtakingly capable. At full price it is difficult to justify for amateur use but, when discounted, can be recommended for those taking their photography more seriously. The raw file facility integrated in this software now takes precedence over the Nikon dedicated program that I formerley used. To help take full advantage of all that the software offers, I recommend 'The missing manual' by Lisa Snider.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Great, as expected
customer_reviews.text: CS6 seems just great. Definitely not had time to fully explore its functionality (who does?!) but a huge step up from Elements 7 which I used previously. Particularly love the Camera Raw dialogue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Strover

customer_reviews.title: Quality as ever
customer_reviews.text: Do ever Adobe ever disappoint? Not in my opinion, although I would simply say to people who have never used Photoshop before try out the Elements version first and if you can get to grips with that then move up to this version. It's for the pro's or serious amateurs and it won't fail to disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Chapman

customer_reviews.title: There's only one Photoshop
customer_reviews.text: The best photo editing tool out there, but costs an arm and a leg. But got a £265 discount, because I had earlier purchased Lightroom 4 a few weeks ago. Thank you Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: vampiro

customer_reviews.title: Too great to handle
customer_reviews.text: I can only say one thing: Awesome! To get get the best of this tool you will need a tablet (Wacom) You can use this tool for so many things. Fix your pictures not only correct simple tasks but delete objects from your photos is so easy. Sketching, Drawing, Painting is so real (with a tablet) Worth every penny! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Hansi

customer_reviews.title: I bought it a couple of years ago and it's great.
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't already bought this - tough; because I don't think you'll get it without a monthly subscription. I bought it a couple of years ago and it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Yorkie

customer_reviews.title: a shocking ask for a bit of software
customer_reviews.text: How any company can ask anything over £50 for software is gob smacking . Anyone who buys this must have more money than sence . Just on price alone regarless of its preformans this must get a 1 star lol Total joke price that really did make me laugh out loud
customer_reviews.author: truthfull talker

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Delivery Promise
customer_reviews.text: The product is, without question, the very best on the Market. It has all the features that a purcheser could desire. Unfortunately, Amazon estimated delivery by 18th August: it is now the 17th and the order has not yet been dispatched. Poor show, Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Why a pen name? Norrie

product_meta.title: Adobe Photoshop CS6 (PC)
product_meta.description:
ADOBE PHOTOSHOP CREATIVE SUITE 6
The world’s best digital imaging software, Adobe Photoshop CS6 delivers magic that helps you bring your creative vision to life. Edit raw image files and other photos with state-of-the-art photo editing. Create compelling HDR images, black-and-whites and panoramas. Retouch images with astonishing ease and control. Design anything you can imagine--at amazing speed. Paint and draw naturally and expressively. Put your ideas in motion by intuitively creating stunning videos.

TOP REASONS TO BUY PHOTOSHOP CREATIVE SUITE 6
CONTENT-AWARE PATCH
Patch images with greater control using Content-Aware Patch, the latest addition to the Content-Aware family of technologies, which allows you to choose the sample area it will use to create your patch.

MERCURY GRAPHICS ENGINE AND 64-BIT SUPPORT
Count on the new Mercury Graphics Engine for blazingly fast performance when editing with key tools, and take advantage of cross-platform 64-bit support to speed up imaging tasks and process very large images faster.*

NEW AND RE-ENGINEERED DESIGN TOOLS
Create superior designs fast. Get consistent formatting with type styles, use vector layers to apply strokes and add gradients to vector objects, easily create custom strokes and dashed lines, quickly search layers, and more.

INTUITIVE VIDEO CREATION
Bring Photoshop editing power to your video footage. Easily enhance any clip using the full range of familiar Photoshop tools, and create videos using an intuitive set of video tools.

ADOBE PHOTOSHOP CAMERA RAW 7 PLUG-IN
Bring out the best in your JPEG and raw files with improved processing and an enhanced control set; reveal every detail in the highlights of an image while still retaining rich detail in the shadows; and much more.

ALL-NEW CROP TOOL
Crop images fast and with greater precision using the all-new, non-destructive crop tool. Manipulate your images on canvas, and take advantage of the Mercury Graphics Engine to see your adjustments happen live.*

SUPERIOR AUTO-CORRECTIONS
Quickly enhance your images with powerful Auto Curves, Levels, and Brightness/Contrast controls. Intelligence from thousands of hand-retouched images is built in to give you a better starting point for making adjustments.

INTELLIGENT LENS CORRECTION
Easily straighten objects that appear curved in panoramas or photos shot with fisheye or wide-angle lenses--and perform automatic lens corrections--using tools that make adjustments based on your lenses' characteristics.

SUPERIOR HDR IMAGING
Create photo-realistic or surreal HDR images with exceptional speed and control. Get great results with automatic ghost removal, and precisely control tone mapping and adjustments.

RICH PAINTING TOOLSET
Simply by painting with presets, get realistic color blends with the Mixer Brush, use Bristle Tips for lifelike strokes, draw naturally with erodible pencils and pastels, easily create the look of an oil painting, and much more.

TOOLS FOR INTELLIGENT SELECTIONS
Create precise selections and masks, enabling you to easily adjust or preserve skin tones; easily select intricate image elements, such as faces or hair; and more.

PUPPET WARP
Precisely reposition any image element to create a more visually appealing photo. For example, easily straighten an awkwardly bent arm. Powered by the new Mercury Graphics Engine, Puppet Warp lets you edit with fluid responsiveness.*

BACKGROUND SAVE AND AUTO-RECOVERY
Let the auto-recovery option preserve your edits without interrupting your progress. Keep working even while saving the largest of Photoshop files in the background.

NEW BLUR GALLERY
Quickly create photographic blur effects using a simple new interface with on-image controls. Create tilt-shift effects, blur everything and then sharpen one focal point, or vary the blurriness between multiple focal points. The new Mercury Graphics Engine delivers immediate results.*

DOZENS OF USER-INSPIRED IMPROVEMENTS
Save time with more than 65 new creativity and productivity enhancements that originated as suggestions from Photoshop users via Facebook, Twitter and more.

MODERN INTERFACE
Work with a fresh, elegant Photoshop interface featuring dark background options that make your images pop, and benefit from hundreds of design touches that create a smoother, more consistent editing experience.

COMPATIBILITY WITH ADOBE MOBILE APPS
Extend your creativity beyond Photoshop CS6 with Adobe Touch Apps and Photoshop companion apps (sold separately). Intuitive touchscreen features provide ease of use and precise control for a variety of creative tasks.†

* Some GPU-enabled features are not supported on Windows XP.

† Mobile and tablet applications require a separate download and agreement to additional terms. Such applications may not be available in all countries or languages and may be subject to change or discontinuation without notice. Additional fees or subscription charges may apply. 

‡ Windows® only. Requires a DisplayPort interface and a 10-bit monitor.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
WHAT IS ADOBE PHOTOSHOP LIGHTROOM? DOES IT WORK WITH PHOTOSHOP CS6?
Photoshop Lightroom software helps you quickly import, process, manage and showcase volumes of photos. Its tight integration with Photoshop CS6 lets you easily take advantage of unrivaled pixel-level retouching and compositing, giving you a complete professional photography solution.

I USE PHOTOSHOP. SHOULD I CONSIDER STEPPING UP TO PHOTOSHOP EXTENDED?
Adobe Photoshop CS6 Extended software delivers everything in Photoshop CS6 plus tools for creating and editing 3D images and performing quantitative image analysis.* Consider Photoshop Extended if your images are used across a variety of media, or if you work in film or video production, architecture, engineering, medicine, scientific research, or manufacturing.

SHOULD I BUY PHOTOSHOP CS6 OR ADOBE CREATIVE SUITE 6 DESIGN STANDARD?
Photoshop CS6 is the professional standard for digital image editing. If your work involves creating and sharing images within page layouts, you may want to consider Creative Suite 6 Design Standard, which includes Photoshop CS6 as well as Adobe Illustrator CS6, InDesign CS6 and Acrobat X Pro. Smooth integration among the components provides an efficient workflow.

* Adobe Photoshop Extended 3D features and some GPU-enabled features are not supported on Windows XP.

HOW DOES PHOTOSHOP CS6 COMPARE WITH PREVIOUS EDITIONS?
Have a look at this version comparison chart.



MANUFACTURER'S DESCRIPTION
Adobe Photoshop CS6 (PC)

BOX CONTAINS


1 x Adobe Photoshop CS6 Windows 7 DVD

See more
feature_bullets: Content-Aware Patch - Patch images with greater control using Content-Aware Patch, the latest addition to the Content-Aware family of technologies, which allows you to choose the sample area it will use to create your patch.

Mercury Graphics Engine and 64-bit support - Count on the new Adobe Mercury Graphics Engine for blazingly fast performance when editing with key tools, and take advantage of cross-platform 64-bit support to speed up imaging tasks and process very large images faster*.

New and reengineered design tools - Create superior designs fast. Get consistent formatting with type styles, use vector layers to apply strokes and add gradients to vector objects, easily create custom strokes and dashed lines, quickly search layers, and more.

Intuitive video creation - Bring Photoshop editing power to your video footage. Easily enhance any clip using the full range of familiar Photoshop tools, and create videos using an intuitive set of video tools.
Adobe Photoshop Camera Raw 7 plug-in - Bring out the best in your JPEG and raw files with improved processing and an enhanced control set
Reveal every detail in the highlights of an image while still retaining rich detail in the shadows
